title: CardFooterAction
description: A button communicates the action that it is going to initiate. Users can click a button to begin a process or workflow, or to trigger an action.

Visible.description: Sets the visibility of the control.

OnPress.description: Action/Rule to be executed when the button is pressed. The ClientAPI object to be received in rule function is [CardFooterButtonProxy](../../../../../apidoc/classes/cardfooterbuttonproxy.md).

enum.description: Less emphasis, but still require user's attention.
Less important actions users can take.
Use it for neutral actions, e.g. Back / Cancel.
Use it for positive actions, e.g. Update / Add / Approve.
Use it for negative actions, e.g. Delete / Reset / Reject.

Semantic.description: Use the semantic buttons for positive and negative actions.

Image.description: The image to be displayed with the title.

ImagePosition.description: Position of the image to be displayed along with the title

Styles.description: Style to be applied on the action button.

Image.description: The string value is a style class name for `Image`.

Button.description: The string value is a style class name for `Button`.

Enabled.description: Sets the button as enabled or disabled.
